content: Transform any plain wall in your home into a technicolored landscape in mere seconds by crafting a rainbow paint roller. Following the simple instructions, you’ll be able to paint ten vibrant colors all at once while simultaneously ruining your home’s resale value.

Great Scott! You’ve never seen a car quite like the DeLorean limousine! An American car enthusiast and a man with impeccable taste, Rich Weissensel has transformed this already classic car into a one of a kind masterpiece.

Get an up close and personal view of that cute little hummingbird as it enjoys a free meal by wearing this unique feeder mask. It features a specialized feeding tube placed right at eye level so you can get some face to face time while it eats directly out of the tube.

Stay visible while biking on the roads at night by strapping on this smart bicycle helmet. The ergonomic design provides a comfortable fit while built-in lights illuminate in the shape of turn signals and stop signs to better communicate your intentions to drivers.

Keep stress levels at a minimum by spending the day soaking in the great outdoors on the hanging canopy bed. It provides ample space to comfortably sit or lay down and features a removable mesh that shields you from pesky insects.

No party would be complete without delicious finger foods – and now you can serve them up in style using the Venn diagram serving platter. This ceramic bowl’s compartmentalized design makes it ideal for serving delicious vegetables or chips with dip.

Start off your days by sharing a little quality time with a beloved childhood friend – the Staypuft Marshmallow Man – using this Ghostbusters themed mug. One side of the mug features the lovable mascot while the other the more sinister paranormal monstrosity.

Become the center of attention wherever you go by transforming yourself into an internet meme using this hilarious Doge mask. This one size fits most mask perfectly captures the Shiba Inu’s sideways glare and raised eyebrow expression.

Unpoppable bubblewrap – what kind of joyless bastard could’ve come up with such a cruel thing? Designed in the deepest pits of hell, this new type of packing material features bubbles that are connected in chains, making them nearly impossible to pop.

Turn virtually any terrain into the ideal campsite by heading out with this hybrid tent hammock. The innovative and functional design allows you to suspend your shelter using the trees around you – so you can stay safe from threats on the ground while sleeping.

Conquer land and sea when you explore the great outdoors on the pod hovercraft. These personal recreational vehicles are safe, quiet, and easy to operate – making them ideal for a day of adventure through everything Mother Nature has to offer.

titleEN: How To Do Miracle Card Tricks
content: Amaze friends and family by performing feats of wizardry after signing up for this video course on how to do miracle card tricks. Featuring over 40 card handling techniques, you’ll learn the ins and outs of the most sought after card tricks known to man.

Avoid busting your butt on an unseen obstacle by illuminating your route using these skateboard headlights. The compact size allows you to mount them onto your trucks so that they remain out of the way while providing great illumination.

Transform your phone into a state of the art veterinary tool by downloading this animal x-ray scanner app. After downloading this novelty app you’ll be able to see a detailed x-ray of various wild animals like rhinos and elephants just by waving your phone over them.

Capture everything around you in stunning detail using this 360 degree 4K spherical camera. It offers 100% spherical capture and global shutter at 60 FPS – and best of all you can play back the footage on anything from a tablet to an Oculus Rift.

Take your riding to new heights by combining traditional pedaling power with electric thrust while riding round on this stealth electric bike. It’s propelled by a 3.7 kW motor and is capable of reaching speeds up to 37 miles per hour.

Maximize your workout by tracking your performance while exercising in this biometric apparel. These app connected garments are made from wrap knit fabric designed to provide stability while reducing fatigue and providing you with almost instantaneous feedback.

Save important documents with a blast from the past by using these retro USB memory sticks. Each of these custom USB drives are made in the image of an obsolete form of technology such as a Sega Genesis controller,  CRT television, and a cassette tape.

Cultivate a soothing environment at the workplace by decorating your desk with these lovely bonsai wire trees. These tiny sculptures are masterfully made entirely out of wire and are small enough to fit in the palm of your hand.

Take one of your favorite raw foods on the go by feasting on this incredibly portable sushi burrito roll. Rather than settling for small pre-made options, you’ll be able to customize your roll with a selection of the freshest and tastiest ingredients around.

Become top dog of the asphalt while riding atop this T-Rex skeleton tricycle. Inspired by the legendary apex predator from the late Cretaceous period, this massive trike stands over eight feet tall and is twelve feet long from head to tail.

Boldly live where no man has lived before by purchasing this virginity protecting Star Trek themed apartment. This incredible living space comes meticulously designed to look like a replica of the Voyager space ship.

Transform yourself into your favorite android superhero by adding this Mega Man helmet onto your ensemble. This wearable helmet is made out of high quality ABS plastic and features authentic proportions with fully functional LED lights for added realism.

Show your sweetie their love sends you to the stars and back by cementing your union using this meteorite ring. It has been cut from a single piece of all natural Bibeon meteorite into an elegant geometric unisex design.

titleEN: Knight Rider K.I.T.T. USB Car Charger
content: Keep your electronic devices powered with help from your favorite artificially intelligent electronic computer module by using this Knight Rider K.I.T.T. USB car charger. It features lights that sync up to it’s audio so it appears as if K.I.T.T. is right there with you!

Add some flair to your outfit by accenting your look with this visually captivating cyberpunk wristwatch. This custom built watch combines technology with the simplicity of a standard wristwatch to create an accessory any sci-fi fan can get behind.

Live the life of a modern day gypsy by staying on the move inside of this tiny mobile home. While this rolling casa is small enough to be towed by a small pickup, its smart and efficient design manages to pack everything from a living room to kitchen into 140 square feet.

Answer calls like the great Captain James Tiberius Kirk did by upgrading to this Bluetooth Star Trek communicator. Modeled after the device from the original series, it features a 32 foot range, a speaker for hands-free use, and authentic sound effects.

Cassettes are back and better than ever now that they’ve been made into functional coffee tables. This custom table stands on four sturdy stainless steel legs and provides ample storage room for all your things while the cassette label functions as a dry erase board.

Make your taste buds go wild by rewarding them with some mouth-watering sriracha bacon. This juicy all natural bacon is marinated in a savory sriracha glaze and then cooked in specialized jerky ovens to create the tastiest snack you’ll ever lay hands on.

Turn heads while you rack up speeding tickets behind the wheel of the Lamborghini Aventador Superveloce. It features a sleek and lightweight carbon fiber frame and enough juice under the hood to go from 0-62 in 2.8 seconds and reach a top speed of 217 MPH.

Let your geek flag fly high by putting your awesome collection of LEGOs on display using this custom action figure case. The case sports a fashionable white frame and features specialized stands that let you put up to 105 of your favorite LEGO action figures on display.

Turn heads wherever you go by cruising through the streets of <del>Gotham</del> your hometown riding atop the Batmobile motorcycle. This custom bike features an all clad hand built frame styled after the caped crusader’s iconic ride.

Drop everyone’s jaw to the ground as you walk into Comic Con dressed from head toe in the Asgardian Iron Man suit.  It’ll give others the opportunity to see what Tony Stark might have looked like had he be been born an Asgardian God.

Ensure you make it through the day without ruining your outfit by dressing up in some stain repelling clothes. Featuring stylish and contemporary designs, they’re engineered to withstand liquids and stains so you’ll stay cleaner for longer.

Put your skills to the test and see if you’ve got what it takes to drive with the best of best on this 3D racing simulator. A 47″ 3D LED screen displays the action while you comfortably sit in the moving cockpit’s racing seat.

If you’re looking for pristine sound and Bluetooth capabilities, then this R2-D2 is the speakerphone you’ve been looking for. In addition this officially licensed product boasts a standard 3.5 mm audio jack and plays movie sound clips when switched on.

Bring a relic of prehistoric times into your modern home by adding this real velociraptor claw to your collection of artifacts. This small yet valuable Cretaceous period fossil was excavated in China and is estimated to be around 75 millions years old!

Cruise down the highway in a piece of automotive history when you get behind the wheel of the Maserati Boomerang. The brainchild of famed Lotus Espirit designer Giorgetto Giuriaro, it’s influenced everything from high end sports cars to the Volkswagen Golf.

Fool yourself into believing you are carb free by enjoying a few slices of this watermelon styled bread. A popular trend in Taiwan, this specially made loaf of bread comes styled like a ripe, juicy watermelon with none of the health benefits and twice the carbs.

Turn a backyard tree into the perfect hangout spot using the tree trunk spiral staircase. This railed staircase wraps around the trunk without damaging the tree, making it a safe to climb and eco-friendly way to ascend to your treehouse.

Give your bedroom a futuristic and minimalistic appeal using this floating bed. This one of a kind bed features a centered one legged frame design that gives the impression the entire bed is magically floating mid-air from the wall.

Turn every marine scientist green with envy when you stroll into the lab wearing octopus tentacle heels. The intricate design gives this pair of shoes a surreal quality that makes it appear like you’re walking on squirming tentacles.

Escape the hustle and bustle of city life by immersing yourself in nature while staying aboard the floating catamaran hotel. The unique design gives guests access to an event hall, cafe, and restaurant while the independently floating units help provide privacy.

Become the pool shark you always knew you could be by perfecting your game on this tournament billiards table. This professional quality table is built to the highest standards to provide superb playing conditions – making it a man cave must-have.

Turn BBQs into gourmet feasts by preparing meals with this portable pizza oven. Although it’s compact enough to easily transport, it features a roomy interior and an authentic stone oven floor that can cook a pizza in just 90 seconds!

Win the yacht club’s monthly pissing contest by adding an inflatable slide onto your extravagant vessel. When the hot tub, helipad, and indentured servants just aren’t enough to show off your absurd degree of wealth, the inflatable slide will surely do the trick.

Give your living room a quirky touch by building your very own weighted Portal storage cube table following these detailed instructions here. Designed by reddit user fetchbeer, this incredible light up table is perfect for diehard Portal fans.

Cook up a feast like the rugged woodsman you are by preparing it on the Swedish log stove top. The straightforward design allows you to turn a split log into a little portable stove top that you can easily light to cook your meals while in the great outdoors.

Give your custom setup a futuristic appeal by utilizing this motorized PC tower case. This eye catching aluminum case supports E-ATX, ATX, and Micro-ATX motherboards while featuring a fully mechanized frame that opens up like a lotus flower.

Put your favorite vinyl on display as you listen to it with the floating record player. Made with audiophile grade parts and components, the intrepid design provides a visually stunning and mechanically sound way to play your favorite tunes.

Enjoy an epic surf session even if you’re not near the ocean by hitting the water on the electric motorized surfboard. The board features an environmentally friendly yet powerful electric jet that’s lightweight and extremely intuitive to operate.

Have a backup plan if you lose your gear while out in the wild by strapping on these survival shoelaces. These one of a kind laces are specially designed to handle a variety of essential outdoor tasks like fishing and starting a fire.

Organize and store all your movies, games, and collectibles using this Tetris modular shelving and storage unit. The colorful and intricate pattern of the unit gives you tons of differently sized storage space so you can accommodate all your stuff.

Give Junior’s room some rugged appeal that’ll also help keep things tidy with this Jeep storage trunk chest. The vintage design perfectly replicates the front end of a World War era Jeep – cast in iron with hand painted decals and providing ample storage space.

Set yourself apart from every other driver on the road when you get behind the wheel of this 3D printed supercar. This revolutionary vehicle boasts 700HP, weighs just 1400 pounds and not surprisingly goes from 0-60 in just 2 seconds flat.

Escape the hustle and bustle of city life and connect with mother nature by renting out this treehouse cabin. This secluded oasis of tranquility surrounds you with amazing vistas while proving all the modern comforts you’ve grown accustomed to like wireless internet.

Spice up your home’s tame decor by accenting it with this centipede styled chair. The intrepid design features wooden legs running across the back that give the chair a reversible quality – allowing it function as two separate chairs or a lounger when combined.

Give your pizza party the perfect ending by serving up some delicious slices of gummy pizza for dessert. Each pie measures 8 inches in diameter and comes with yummy fruit flavored toppings that all add up to a heavenly 1,300 calories of cavity spawning goodness.

The driftwood dragon statue is proof that man can turn almost anything from nature into breathtaking structures. Designed by master sculptor James Doran- Webb, this mammoth and intricately designed statue stands over nine feet tall.

Let those nearest and dearest to you know how you feel about them by showering them with affection using these pessimistic balloons. With fun messages like “you are a waste of blood and organs” and the always popular “bastard”, you’ll surely get a big thanks.

Introducing the male birth control pill – the game changing contraceptive that gives you all the benefits of a vasectomy without actually cutting up the family jewels. Now all you’ve got to worry about is chlamydia, herpes, gonorrhea, and HIV – so let the good times roll!

Ensure guests remain socially lubricated at your next outdoor gathering by keeping the liquor flowing with help from the portable whiskey bar. No matter where the party’s at, this little trailer easily sets up to provide guests with first class cocktails.

Take part in the elite activity of yachting at fraction of the cost by hitting the seas on the capsule mini yacht. What it lacks in size, it more than makes up for with features like a sleek modern interior and first rate navigation gear.

Get the best of both worlds by playing your favorite exclusive titles on this XBox One & PS4 combination gaming console laptop. It incorporates both consoles into its design so you can play whatever game strikes your fancy on the full 22 inch HD display.

Practice the skills you’ll one day need to survive by working on your aim using The Walking Dead themed crossbow. This plastic prop replica features a realistic appearance and a lightweight frame so you can comfortably tote it around.

Glide through the water with the same grace as a majestic sea creature by diving in with the underwater jetski. It provides superior maneuvering in the water and features a six gear transmission so you can cruise at different speeds.

Give your indie films a professional feel to them by capturing footage with the aerial cinematography drone. It provides unsurpassed stability and is designed to be compatible with a number of various cameras ranging from the Canon 5D to a RED Epic.

Gain a new appreciation for the world around you by soaring over it like a majestic eagle riding on this electric tricopter. The tricopter design provides unsurpassed stability and control, allowing you to fly it virtually anywhere.

Unleash the primal warrior within by wielding these beautiful handforged tools and weapons. Forged in the good ol’ US of A, each of these custom made masterpieces feature a highly detailed solid stainless steel head and sturdy wooden shaft.

Rule over the seven kingdoms by sitting high atop this Iron Throne made of dildos. Inspired from HBO’s hit TV/soft porno series Game Of Thrones, this erotic masterpiece of a chair is expertly assembled by skilled artists and features 200 imposing dildos.

Tote your gear around in style with this original Playstation bag. Inspired by the iconic gaming console, the bag replicates all the lines and contours of the original device perfectly and features heavily padded sides that make it great for transporting laptops.

Dine amongst the clouds like the gods by celebrating your next event aboard this suspended dinner table. You and your closest friends will be treated to five star dining while enjoying a breathtaking view of the cityscape below – just don’t drop your steak knife.

Find out what it’s like to suck on a small critter by indulging on a realistic animal lollipop. These sugary masterpieces are expertly crafted by hand into small and lifelike animals like goldfish, snakes, pandas, and even dragons.

Turn your grueling cardio workouts into a fun filled social event with the seven person tricycle. This recreational vehicle accommodates you and six of your closest friends so that everyone can enjoy the fresh air while conversing and taking in the rolling vistas.

Give your love palace a regal appearance with this retractable hanging bed. The intrepid design employs a system of ropes and pulleys to suspend the bed in midair, thereby giving you the option of choosing the appropriate hanging height.

Save money and fill up less often by keeping track of your car’s fuel performance with this gas efficiency monitoring device. It tracks all of your car’s vitals to help you drive at the optimal level to get the most mileage from a tank of gas.

See if you’ve got what it takes to hang with the best of best by getting behind the wheel of the realistic racing simulator. The high quality audio and video combine with features like a low mass motion system to bring you an unrivaled virtual driving experience.

<del>Guarantee yourself a trip to the E.R.</del> Sharpen your samurai skills by practicing with this beautiful hand forged katana. It features a stunning hand sharpened 28.7″ steel blade and comes with premium engraved copper fittings.

Create an enchanting environment for your little ones to play on by placing them on top of the light up star carpet. The carpet is sturdy enough to walk on yet soft enough to lie on and comes lined with dozens of shimmering stars for entertaining the kids.

Tread through the water with the same level of agility you would have on the slopes by riding atop the snowmobile jet ski. It utilizes skis located below the aluminum hull to hydrodynamically lift the ski to a cruising altitude above water’s surface.

Create the ideal atmosphere for rest and relaxation by giving the room a soothing glow using this color changing glow sphere. It’s beautifully crafted from glass and can change between 16 different colors to create the perfect environment.

Experience your favorite old school video games on an entirely different level when you play them on the enormous 19″ screen of the giant Game Boy emulator. It’s laser cut to resemble the iconic portable gaming system and powered by Rasphberry Pi.

Give your inner child – as well as your actual children – the vacation of a lifetime by taking the whole family to the LEGO themed hotel. Sparing no expense, every nook and cranny in this uniquely themed hotel is styled in the iconic brick-like fashion from the LEGO world.

Make an epic entrance at any event by showing up riding atop the 46-1/2″ tires of the monster truck limo. With first class amenities such as a full bar and all leather seats, this mammoth vehicle will make the ride to any party one to remember.

Create striking visuals with the pull of a trigger by building your very own propane rifle. This DIY video will give you the low down on everything you need to know in order to build your very own rifle. You’ll be annoying the neighbors in no time at all.

Keep all your equipment safely organized as you drive around from job to job with the modular truck bed box. This completely customizable bed box is designed with functionality in mind – featuring adjustable dividers, tool holders, LED lighting and a security system.

Get a first hand look at the treasures of the deep as you pass over them on the clear bottom kayak. It can accommodate either one or two passengers and features a unique transparent bottom design so you can clearly see what you’re rowing over.

Get a little more bang for your buck by prolonging the lifespan of your batteries using these revolutionary sleeves. Traditional batteries leave behind up to 80% of their usable energy – these sleeves allow you to tap into this energy and extend battery life by 800%.

Construct your very own floating piece of heaven on the water using the modular platform. This customizable buoyant base can serve a multitude of needs such as operating as a docking station, an outdoor living room, or even a helipad.

Play out your own epic action sequences as you journey to Bullet Farm or Gas Town with the LEGO Mad Max vehicles. Designed by LEGO Will, every armored vehicle, motorcycle, and blood bag transporter is represented in this unique LEGO set.

Make yourself look stellar before heading out by accenting your outfit with these constellation earrings. Available in either the Big Dipper, Little Dipper, or Orion’s Belt – each earring is made from silver wire accentuated by topaz stars.

Redefine the term “off-road” by taking on the great outdoors aboard the amphibious pickup truck. It can transition between water and land at the push of a button and reach speeds up to 30 MPH on water as you and six passengers ride safely inside.

Treat yo-self to a day of world-class pampering while in the comfort of home with this water therapy spa bed. The intrepid design seamlessly joins water and light to surround the senses and melt all your stress away.

Create the illusion you own a real functioning pokeball with this expertly made light up version. The center of the ball features a built in light that shines bright red to mimic how the pokeball looks after it has recently captured an elusive pokemon.

Channel your inner Wookie by keeping warm while wearing this Chewbacca hoodie. This novelty garment covers your entire torso with a thick and luxurious auburn coat of Wookie fur that’ll make you look exactly like the iconic Chewbacca.

When you’re in need of some help in the kitchen, the R2-D2 measuring cup set is definitely the droid you’re looking for. Almost every piece of this tiny R2 unit disassembles to provide you with a useful set of measuring cups and spoons.

titleEN: Monthly Snacks From Around The World
content: Send your taste buds on an international gastronomic adventure by signing up for this monthly snacks from the around the world subscription. Each month you’ll receive a box crammed with exotic and delicious treats from countries like Israel, Italia, and Scandinavia.

Wake up to a delightful scent – and not an incessant beeping alarm – by placing this smell based alarm clock in your bedroom. It utilizes cartridges with real scents to fill the room with aromas like “fig”, “hot croissant”, “peach”, or “dollar” to gently wake you up.

See if you have what it takes to rule over the houses of Baratheon and Lannister by trying on this Game Of Thrones royal crown. It’s cast directly from the screen-used prop, includes an iron sword motif display stand, and comes with a certificate of authenticity.
